oai_dc:dc.dc:title: French. Lizzie Crozier French Scrapbook, p. 36 b
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Lizzie Crozier French Scrapbook, p. 36 b. Newspaper clipping: fragment (continuation of 36 a) "Oh, there's no use to explain to you..."

oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814. Please provide a brief description of the material.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Oh, there's no use to explain to you," answered the sweet young thing, "your never would understand." And the reporter, not knowing much about women, anyway, frankly admitted that there was a possibility that he wouldn't understand, and did not push the lady for her explanation. With regard to the county ticket, however, with the sole exception of Miss Watson's race, the women may
